hero.title: Manage all your fishery machinery production
hero.description: From request to operation, our platform optimizes the management of fishery machinery, helping you control each stage of the production process efficiently and easily.

descriptions.inventory: Manage your fishery machinery inventory efficiently and easily.
descriptions.invoicing: Create invoices quickly and easily, and keep track of your income and expenses.
descriptions.equipmentMonitoring: Monitor the status of your equipment in real time and receive maintenance notifications.
descriptions.orderingMachine: Request machines quickly and easily, and keep track of your requests.

subscriptions.title: Types of Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: Discover and choose the subscription that best suits you to achieve potential growth in your company
